page.title: 17A Claydon Farm Worker's Day
page.content: {0630}Get up,breakfast,gardening. {0750}Walk to farm to begin work.Check oil etc on tractor and drive to main farm.Check and feed sheep: 500 ewes & lambs. {0930}Coffee break {0940}Varies according to season.Could be haymaking,combining cereals and rape.The men maintain their own vehicles,this is done daily. {1230}Lunch time.Gardening. {1330}Currently picking up and stacking bales of hay in the dutch barn. {1700}Finish work unless a busy season when it could dusk before work ends. {1800}Dinner {1900}Gardening,Bellringing once a week.Watch television. {2000}Go to bed. The work varies so that no 2 days are the same.
